CustomCommands.CustomCommand: param() $today = Get-Date [string]$fromDate = $today.AddDays(1).ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") [string]$startDate = $today.ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") [string]$toDate = $today.AddDays(31).ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") $Append = '?fromDate=' + $fromDate + '&toDate=' + $toDate + '&$filter=startDate gt datetime''' + $startDate + 'T23:59:59Z''' $result = Invoke-SFRestMethod -BaseUrl $global:_url -EndPoint "odata/v2/PerPersonal" -Append $Append $global:_departments = $result return $result

param() $today = Get-Date [string]$fromDate = $today.AddDays(1).ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") [string]$startDate = $today.ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") [string]$toDate = $today.AddDays(31).ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") $Append = '?fromDate=' + $fromDate + '&toDate=' + $toDate + '&$filter=startDate gt datetime''' + $startDate + 'T23:59:59Z''' $result = Invoke-SFRestMethod -BaseUrl $global:_url -EndPoint "odata/v2/EmpEmployment" -Append $Append $global:_employments = $result return $result

param() $today = Get-Date [string]$fromDate = $today.AddDays(1).ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") [string]$startDate = $today.ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") [string]$toDate = $today.AddDays(91).ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") $Append = '?fromDate=' + $fromDate + '&toDate=' + $toDate + '&$filter=effectiveStartDate gt datetime''' + $startDate + 'T23:59:59Z''' $result = Invoke-SFRestMethod -BaseUrl $global:_url -EndPoint "odata/v2/Position" -Append $Append $global:_positions = $result return $result

param() $today = Get-Date [string]$fromDate = $today.AddDays(1).ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") [string]$startDate = $today.ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") [string]$toDate = $today.AddDays(91).ToString("yyyy-MM-dd") $Append = '?fromDate=' + $fromDate + '&toDate=' + $toDate + '&$filter=startDate gt datetime''' + $startDate + 'T23:59:59Z''' $result = Invoke-SFRestMethod -BaseUrl $global:_url -EndPoint "odata/v2/EmpJob" -Append $Append "odata/v2/EmpJob" $global:_jobs = $result return $result
